LightningComponentBundle.description: Signature Pad LWC to be used in record apges, app pages, home pages and flow screens

property.name: showTitle
property.description: Show the Title above the box?
property.label: Show Title?

property.name: title
property.description: Title for the signature box. It can merge current record fields with e.g. {{Record.Name}}.
property.label: Title

property.name: showIcon
property.description: Show the Icon in the title
property.label: Show Title Icon?

property.name: iconName
property.description: Name of the icon to show in the title. Icons: https://www.lightningdesignsystem.com/icons/
property.label: Icon Name

property.name: boxWidth
property.description: Width of the box for signing. It supports px and %. If you don't add the type it will default to px. Use % for responsiveness.
property.label: Box Width (px or %)

property.name: boxHeight
property.description: Height of the box for signing. It supports px and %. If you don't add the type it will default to px.
property.label: Box Height (px or %)

property.name: boxBorderWidth
property.description: The width of the border of the box
property.label: Box Border Width (px)

property.name: boxBorderStyle
property.description: The style of the border of the box
property.label: Box Border Style
property.datasource: none, dotted, dashed, solid, double, groove, ridge, inset, outset

property.name: boxBorderColor
property.description: The color of the border of the box. It suppors color name (blue), HEX (#0000FF), RGB (rgb(0, 0, 255)), RGBA (rgb(0, 0, 255, 1), HSL (hsl(240, 100%, 50%)) and HSLA (hsla(240, 100%, 50%, 1)) values.
property.label: Box Border Color

property.name: boxBackground
property.description: The background color of the box. It suppors color name, HEX, RGB, RGBA, HSL and HSLA values.
property.label: Box background Color

property.name: lineStroke
property.description: The Stroke style for the signature. It supports any color (see boxBorderColor help), gradient or pattern.
property.label: Signature Line Stroke

property.name: lineWidth
property.description: The width (px) of the line for the signature.
property.label: Signature Line Width

property.description: Title of the file to save. If not specified a generic title will be generated. It can merge current record fields with e.g. {{Record.Name}}.

property.name: recordIdToLinkTo
property.description: The API Field name of the record id field that we want to link the file to. If not specified it will use the current Record Id. It can merge current record fields with e.g. {{Record.AccountId}}
property.label: Field with Id to Link To
property.placeholder: Empty to use current recordId or {{Record.AccountId}}
